select a.storeId,a.storeNo,a.addTime,b.accountName,s.`name`,a.process,a.remark from t_store a LEFT join sys_user b on a.userId=b.userId LEFT JOIN sys_supervisor s on s.supervisorId=a.supervisorId where 1=1
AND ( b.accountName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.accountName}),'%') )
AND a.supervisorId = #{relationMap.supervisor}
AND a.process = #{relationMap.repaymentStatus}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY a.addTime DESC
select bankType,accountType,userName,cardNumber,idType,idCard,remark from t_bankCard where userId=(select userId from t_store where storeId = #{storeId})

select a.repayNo,a.addTime,c.orderNumber,b.storeName,a.repayDate,a.planTotal/100 planTotal,a.status from t_repay a LEFT join t_store b on a.userId=b.userId LEFT join t_order c on a.orderId=c.orderId where 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.repayDate,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.repayDate,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND a.status = #{relationMap.repaymentStatus}
AND ( a.repayNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') or c.orderNumber LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') or b.storeName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') )
ORDER BY a.addTime ASC
